disease: Malignant neoplasm of overlapping sites of connective and soft tissue

symptoms.name: Pain
symptoms.pattern: May be localized or widespread depending on location and extent of tumor

symptoms.name: Mass or lump
symptoms.pattern: Palpable mass or swelling in affected area

vital_signs.heart_rate: May be elevated in advanced stages
vital_signs.respiratory_rate: May be elevated in advanced stages
vital_signs.temperature: May be elevated due to infection or inflammation

lab_values.Complete blood count (CBC): May show anemia, leukocytosis, or thrombocytopenia
lab_values.Liver function tests (LFTs): May be abnormal if liver metastasis is present
lab_values.Tumor markers: May be elevated depending on the specific type of connective tissue tumor

imaging_findings.X-ray: May show bone destruction or soft tissue mass
imaging_findings.CT scan: Provides detailed images of the tumor and surrounding tissues
imaging_findings.MRI: Provides high-resolution images of soft tissues, helpful in assessing tumor extent
imaging_findings.PET scan: Detects metabolic activity of the tumor, useful in staging and monitoring treatment response

required: Histological confirmation of malignant neoplasm in connective or soft tissue
Involvement of overlapping sites of connective and soft tissue
supportive: Imaging findings consistent with malignant neoplasm
Clinical symptoms and physical examination findings

differential_diagnoses: Benign tumors of connective and soft tissue
